sentences.sentence: She had a dimple which appeared when she smiled.
To further improve taste, check out its "belly button": At the blossom end, eggplants have either an oval or round dimple.
sentences.translation: 要进一步改善口感，看看它的“肚脐”：在有花的一端，茄子会有一个椭圆或圆形的小凹。

sentences.sentence: You got a very cute dimple in your cheek.
sentences.translation: 你脸上有一个好可爱的酒窝。
